bio: I'm Ryosuke, a neuroscientist orignially from Japan. Currently, I am working as a postdoctoral researcher (HFSP postdoctoral fellow) in Portugues lab at Technical Univeristy of Munich. Prior to the postdoc, I completed a PhD inNeuroscience at Yale University, as well as bachelor's and master's degrees at the University of Tokyo. Please look at the Research page for more about my research.
